blog.title: M(o)usi(e)ng Time
blog.description: Love anything that's unique, niche and fascinating, so I can write about it. Also, Appreciation Weeks center.

title: Avengers Steampunk AU #1
body:
Kind of trailer for the series of connected prompts and ideas. I hope you’d like it, even if for a simple read of a prompt. 

A long time ago I’ve started ploting a story about Avengers in 19th Century. It was an answer for a prompt, but in the end I’ve lost any interest in it, and even if I’d tried to reopen this project I’d stuck somewhere in the research area. Too much information to find, the organize, then reorganize, then write, the correct, then… I’ve lost an interest for MCU, then it was back thanks to Infinity War (well, not for long, but still). So I’ve thought I’ll share it with you, maybe someone will be inspired to write it or discuss or read my description, or whatever else it to do with a VERY DESCRIPTIVE and detailed prompt devided into parts.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

I’m at a point where I feel comfortable upping the amount of updates per week. This way we can get to the parts with Carol faster have a lot more funny pages to laugh at every week!

The first few issues of an event are always the hardest to make fun off, because it’s all set up and big action scenes. But when the plot actually starts, that’s when the stupidity grows accordingly! So, follow me, and together, we will rule the galaxy!

summary:
Movie Review: 
Captain America: The First Avenger. 📺 

During World War 2, a new hero emerges from a strong determination and...
caption:
Movie Review:
Captain America: The First Avenger. 📺

During World War 2, a new hero emerges from a strong determination and willpower. I really liked the fact that the hero in this one is really an ordinary person with a good character.

When the scientist discovers him as worthy of becoming a hero, it’s really the sign that inner beauty is much more important than outer beauty in this world.

The movie is good and the end makes you think about all the promises people make in their lives yet the truth is we really don’t have no freaking idea what could happen in life.

In conclusion, enjoy your life as much as you can. You only live once. Better be good to receive good. Be kind to receive kindness. Be extraordinary to receive extraordinary gifts this life has to offer you. 🌸📺

summary:
a Marvel / TW crossover? Okay so hear me out:  (because apparently I’ve lost my mind)
 So that night when Liam jumped out of the...
body:
a Marvel / TW crossover? Okay so hear me out:  (because apparently I’ve lost my mind)

 So that night when Liam jumped out of the manhole and wolfed out in front of everyone… What if there in the distance, behind all the commotion, Nick Fury stood in a shadowy corner watching? What if he quietly said into his earpiece, “Potential Avenger detected.”

And at the end of the episode, in the last minute (Marvel style), we see Fury approach Liam and ask if he’s got some free time to discuss things. He mentions a blue serum that could take Liam’s abilities to the next level - transform him into what they call Super Wolf, he also talks about effective anger management activities and about a Mr. Bruce Banner that has suffered equal struggles with his temper and that he’s more than willing to coach Liam.

So after graduation Liam makes a trip to New York and there’s a big black car marked “Stark Industries” and a guy named Happy waiting for Liam. Happy drives him to this massive compound and he doesn’t even need to go through security clearing. This laser scans his eyeball and then a robotic voice says his name and grants him access. He sends Mason snaps of all this as it happens and nearly chokes when the Tony Stark emerges and accompanies into the elevator.

They get to the top floor and Liam is so awestruck that he can’t even talk. Besides Tony Stark - Iron Man himself - giving Liam a tour of the grounds, there’s Sam Wilson, the fucking Falcon, Steve-Captain frikken America- Rodgers and Black Widow!!!!  Liam is going to pass out!! He hears some really guttural growling from another room, “That’s the Hulk.” says Tony, smiling next to him. Liam gets introduced to each of them, they’re super friendly. Tony tells them about Liam’s abilities, The Falcon says he wants to see the shift and Liam shows him, and explains the eye color differences. Sam thinks it’s fucking awesome and calls Bucky Frikken Barnes over to come see. Liam tells him he’ll swap the claws for the metal any day. Bucky smiles.

Tony takes him to the lab a little later, and he’s shown prototypes of what he could potentially become after having been treated with the serum- it’s huge! - they don’t force him into anything though, or try sell it to him in any way. It’s merely an offer, something to consider. Tony and Fury say they can really use Liam’s super tuned senses (which will also be enhanced by the serum), his speed, and strength. Tony also offers to pay for his college tuition and says there’s a room for him in the tower.

“Peter stays here too. I think you two will really get along.”

Oh my god, Liam thinks, is he talking about…

“Ah, here he is now!”

There’s a red and blue flash near the window, and the next minute it opens and goddamn Spider Man swings in by one of his webs! He lands with perfect precision and Liam is just like… wow!  Peter pulls his mask off and smiles at them, comes closer to shake Liam’s hand and Liam can’t help but stare a bit. Spider Man is so damn cute!

Tony leads them down to the training area and asks Peter to go a few rounds with Liam so they can see what he’s capable of. He shows off with all the synced moves he and Theo practiced, and it turns out him and Peter actually have a bunch in common, they make a really mean team. He ignores the chuckles from the other guys about them being the babies (which they are). Tony says Super Wolf can easily be battle-paired with either Hulk (because they’re the same size when shifted post-serum) or with Spidey.

Later, when it’s time to go home, Steve sees Liam out, he says “I really hope you join us, we’ll take good care of you.”

And Liam looks over to where Peter is sitting perched on the edge of the couch, smiling at him (Natasha playfully punches his arms and he blushes before looking back at Liam)

“Yeah… I’ll think about it.”  he says, winking at Pete. And then, when he eventually moves in, Peter is the one who meets him at the door and they both just kind of sigh with relief.

And that’s how Liam Dunbar becomes Super Wolf. He teaches Peter how to play lacrosse and he brings the pack around to meet the Avengers. Sam uses Corey to scare the rest of the guys, Mase has some deep intellectual conversations with Mr. Stark, Theo and Bucky bond, Scott and Steve hit it off really well, and Lydia and Natasha are just unstoppable.

The pack forms an allegiance with the Avengers after that, and from then on The Wolves of War help out whenever there is a threat and also have cleared access to any Stark facility at any time.

He hears some really guttural growling from another room, “That’s the Hulk.” says Tony, smiling next to him. Liam gets introduced to each of them, they’re super friendly. Tony tells them about Liam’s abilities, The Falcon says he wants to see the shift and Liam shows him, and explains the eye color differences. Sam thinks it’s fucking awesome and calls Bucky Frikken Barnes over to come see. Liam tells him he’ll swap the claws for the metal any day. Bucky smiles.

Tony takes him to the lab a little later, and he’s shown prototypes of what he could potentially become after having been treated with the serum- it’s huge! - they don’t force him into anything though, or try sell it to him in any way. It’s merely an offer, something to consider. Tony and Fury say they can really use Liam’s super tuned senses (which will also be enhanced by the serum), his speed, and strength. Tony also offers to pay for his college tuition and says there’s a room for him in the tower.

“Peter stays here too. I think you two will really get along.”

Oh my god, Liam thinks, is he talking about…

“Ah, here he is now!”

There’s a red and blue flash near the window, and the next minute it opens and goddamn Spider Man swings in by one of his webs! He lands with perfect precision and Liam is just like… wow!  Peter pulls his mask off and smiles at them, comes closer to shake Liam’s hand and Liam can’t help but stare a bit. Spider Man is so damn cute!

Tony leads them down to the training area and asks Peter to go a few rounds with Liam so they can see what he’s capable of. He shows off with all the synced moves he and Theo practiced, and it turns out him and Peter actually have a bunch in common, they make a really mean team. He ignores the chuckles from the other guys about them being the babies (which they are). Tony says Super Wolf can easily be battle-paired with either Hulk (because they’re the same size when shifted post-serum) or with Spidey.

Later, when it’s time to go home, Steve sees Liam out, he says “I really hope you join us, we’ll take good care of you.”

And Liam looks over to where Peter is sitting perched on the edge of the couch, smiling at him (Natasha playfully punches his arms and he blushes before looking back at Liam)

“Yeah… I’ll think about it.”  he says, winking at Pete. And then, when he eventually moves in, Peter is the one who meets him at the door and they both just kind of sigh with relief.

And that’s how Liam Dunbar becomes Super Wolf. He teaches Peter how to play lacrosse and he brings the pack around to meet the Avengers. Sam uses Corey to scare the rest of the guys, Mase has some deep intellectual conversations with Mr. Stark, Theo and Bucky bond, Scott and Steve hit it off really well, and Lydia and Natasha are just unstoppable.

The pack forms an allegiance with the Avengers after that, and from then on The Wolves of War help out whenever there is a threat and also have cleared access to any Stark facility at any time.

body:
Monsters in the Light

Wanda Maximoff x Reader

Words:611

AN: I wanted to write something really cute and fluffy with Wanda as i absolutely love her. Enjoy! 💖 @ovshiza @wlw5eva @pleasantlyannoyingperson it’s still heartbreak season but I thought I’d give y’all a break.

Warning: Insecure Wanda I don’t know if that needs to be a warning but oh well.

You stare up at the ceiling helplessly, just praying for sleep. Groaning you roll over and face your beautiful girlfriend, Wanda, you couldn’t help but move the strand of hair from her face and then continue combing your fingers through it.

“Wanda,” you whisper pressing a light kiss to her cheek, “Wanda…” kiss… “please…” kiss… “wake up.”

“I’m awake princess” Wanda giggles, “Can’t you sleep?”

“No,” you grumble as you sit up. “Sorry I woke you up, I guess I was just lonely and wanted to talk.” You look down at the comforter embarrassed.

Wanda places her finger under your chin and lifts your face, so you are staring directly into her eyes. “Don’t be sorry. I honestly don’t mind.” Wanda smiles, a sight that still makes your heart melt. It’s a beautiful, loving smile; one that even if you tried your hardest you couldn’t fake.

“Can I tell you a secret?” you asked her.

“Of course, you can!”

“Not so much anymore but when I was younger and still quite recently I used to be terrified of the dark.”

“What changed?” she questioned.

“You.” You press a sweet kiss to her lips as you watch her entire face light up.

“You’re not serious?” she laughed.

“I am. I’m completely serious. We are always taught that monsters hide in the dark, they also hide in the light. Now not only do I have a powerful gorgeous girlfriend to protect me if any monsters do come out at night. You’ve also shown me that the majority of monsters in the world don’t come out in the dark, the attack in the light.”

Wanda was shocked. She couldn’t believe what she was hearing.

“You make me feel safe at night Wanda,” you continued… “safe and loved. Before I met you I barely slept; and whenever I did manage to fall asleep I was plague with nightmares. But they’ve all stopped; because of you.”

Wanda loved you, there was no denying that, but in this moment Wanda’s love for you grew massively. She knew you loved her, but she never realized how much she’d impacted and changed your life. You had changed her life so much; you gave her a safe space when the stress of missions and being an avenger, all got too much; she didn’t have to hide herself or her powers. With you there was no pretending. No hiding. With you the only thing Wanda had to be was herself and you loved her whole heartedly for it.

To hear that by her being your girlfriend had helped and impacted your life made Wanda’s heart swell. To hear that because of her you slept soundly at night was such a weight of her shoulders. Wanda always worried that she was never good enough, that she could never repay you for all that you did for her; but now those worries were slipping away. Hearing you say it out loud made Wanda realize that it didn’t matter what the whole world thought of her. It didn’t matter if they didn’t think she was good enough. All that matters are what she thinks of herself. Sitting here right now, in this bed with you Wanda knew she was good enough. She knew she could take on whatever the world threw at her.

“I love you Y/N” Wanda whispers, “and I promise I’ll protect you from all the monsters whether they are in the dark or light.” She pulls you towards her, “so sleep my love; you have nothing to fear. I promise I’ll be here when you wake up” Wanda presses a kiss to your forehead and snuggles into your neck.

“I love you too Wanda” you whisper before sleep finally takes over your body.

title: No Conditions, No Reservations - Chapter 7
body:
I’ve literally been building towards what starts in this chapter since I came up with the idea for this AU. It’s what got the idea in my head in the first place. I hope you guys are as excited as I am!

Word count: 1388

Warnings: Not the most interesting chapter but really necessary for the story arc. There is a bit of cute fluff at the beginning, though!

——————————

You awoke with the weight of Bucky’s metal arm across your stomach, warm from being pressed against your stomach where your shirt had ridden up. His deep, even breaths tickled the back of your neck and caused you to smile. He’d slept soundly all night.

With a groan and a sigh, Bucky pulled you in closer and snuggled his face into the crook of your shoulder. You tried to wiggle out of his arms to get up but he held you tighter.

“Mmmmm,” he mumbled, “don’t go.”

“Well, good morning, sleepyhead,” you whispered. “I need to go to the bathroom.”

Bucky let out a disgruntled huff but released you. You came back over to the bed when you were done.

“Here.” Bucky patted the bed next to him and gave you his best puppy dog eyes. “Snuggle with me?”

“I’d love to, but I have to get ready for work.”

His face screwed up. “You have work today?”

You couldn’t help but laugh at his confused expression. “Yes, Bucky, I have work today. We met on Saturday and yesterday was Sunday. Today is Monday and I have to work.”

It was as though Bucky had made it his goal to make it impossible for you to get ready. He got up and practically hung from your shoulders as you selected your outfit for the day, only letting go when you shooed him out of the bathroom for your shower. Fortunately by the time you were out, Bucky was no longer in your room. You quickly finished getting ready for the day and headed toward the kitchen to see what you could grab for breakfast.

The smell of sausage and eggs assailed your senses as you approached, and to your surprise you found Bucky in the kitchen, wearing a green apron and standing over the stove.

“Perfect timing,” he grinned as you entered. “The toast should be up any minute and I just finished the sausage and eggs.” The sound of the toast popping up punctuated his sentence.

You moved to the toaster and pulled the four pieces of bread out. “What would you like on yours?”

“Strawberry jam, please,” he replied distractedly as he plated the eggs and sausage.

You went ahead and put jam on all four pieces and brought them to where he was setting the plates on the table. His face lit up when he saw them.

“Yes!” He saw your curious look and explained, “Steve’s the only other one around here who uses enough jam.”

Laughing, you replied, “Well, you’ve got to have enough to taste it.”

“Exactly!”

The breakfast conversation topics ranged around your favorite foods as the two of you got to know each other. You learned that Bucky would try anything at least once because he was so fascinated by the different cuisines from all over the world that could now be found in New York. He was telling you about his favorite Indian restaurant when you realized you had to leave immediately if you were going to make it to work on time.

Without thinking about it, you gave Bucky a quick peck on the cheek as you rushed out. He sat in his chair for several minutes with a big grin on his face before finally getting up to do the dishes.

———-

“Okay, Y/N, spill everything.” Margie practically assaulted you as you entered through the back door. “Jon’s been begging me to call you all weekend, and if I go home with nothing he just might kill me.”

You laughed at your coworker’s expression. “What do you want to know?”

“What’s he like? Is he different with you than with other people? Does the metal arm freak you out at all? Are you going to talk him into getting a haircut?” She sighed. “Also, Jon wants to know if the sex is amazing, but you don’t have to tell me. Please don’t tell me, actually. Tell me to tell him to forget about ever finding out.”

“We haven’t had sex yet,” you admitted. “He’s really sweet and wants to fall in love with who I am before we go that far, rather than take that step just because we’re soulmates. He’s quieter around most other people, but he doesn’t change his personality for anyone. The metal arm does not freak me out and,” you dropped to a conspiratorial whisper, “I may be getting my own soon, but he doesn’t know that yet.”

Margie’s screech brought Andrew out of his office with his phone in hand.

“Who’s hurt? Do I need to call 911?”

“Y/N is getting a metal arm!”

Andrew sighed and tucked his phone back in his pocket. “As epically cool as that is, could we save the horror film sound effects for actual emergencies, please?”

“Might be getting a metal arm,” you corrected Margie. “Tony and Bruce think it will work since Bucky has one, but since I’ve never had a left arm, we’re not positive my brain will know what to do with it. We won’t know until we try it.”

“I’m guessing you need leave for recovery when you have it attached?” Andrew asked.

Your eyes grew wide. “I didn’t think about that. I’ll ask Tony tonight what he recommends.”

“Go ahead and call him,” Andrew suggested. “The sooner we can plan the schedule, the better. Worst case, I have to help Margie for a couple hours a day until Karen gets here at noon.”

“I’ll do that,” you nodded, pulling out your phone and turning to Margie. “And I’ll sanitize the computer keyboards when I’m done. Can you go ahead and get today’s paperwork started?”

“It’s what I do best,” she replied with a grin. “Go call Iron Man, with whom you’re now on a first-name basis. Jon is gonna be so jealous.”

You laughed and placed your call as she headed out front.

———-

Tony had squealed like a little girl when he heard your voice. Your leave happened much earlier than you were expecting, but your boss had been fully supportive. Happy arrived within the hour to smuggle you back to the tower without Bucky finding out. You wouldn’t be back to work until the next week.

Shuri had already fabricated your new arm and sent it via courier along with the equipment used to install Bucky’s current arm. It was even more beautiful than you had imagined it would be. Looking at it, you felt a burst of excitement bubble up in your stomach. You were getting an arm just like Bucky’s!

Bruce talked to you through the prep for your procedure, telling you what to expect and how long it would likely take.

“We’re not sure how the anesthetic will work since you’re affected by the same serum as Bucky,” he told you, “but since we want to surprise him with your arm and he’ll feel anything you feel during the procedure, we’re going to knock you both out. That combined anesthetic, without actually having the double dose in your system, should be enough. F.R.I.D.A.Y. will be monitoring just in case. You still want to do this?”

You nodded. “I really do. How are you going to knock Bucky out without telling him, though?”

“Oh, we’ve got our best people on it,” Tony laughed, coming in. “There’s no one better for the job.”

“You sent Clint, didn’t you?”

“I sent Clint.”

———-

Clint grinned to himself as he stalked his prey, crawling through the air ducts above the common room. Nat had placed herself exactly where he had asked her to, putting her conversation partner in just the right spot. He had been in position for just over a minute when she flashed him the signal. With a smirk, he lined up his shot and let his arrow fly.

“What the hell?”

Barnes mumbled and clawed at the tranquilizer dart before he hit the floor, Tony’s specialized super-strength knockout drug rapidly working its way through his system.

Natasha shot a thumb’s up at the vent Clint had fired through, and he kicked the cover open so he could drop himself down into the room.

“Mission complete,” she told him.

“I never miss,” he replied with a laugh. Barnes would be pissed when he woke up, but he’d leave that for Y/N to deal with. After all, it was technically her fault anyway.
body_abstract:
I’ve literally been building towards what starts in this chapter since I came up with the idea for this AU. It’s what got the idea in my head in the first place. I hope you guys are as excited as I am!

Word count: 1388

Warnings: Not the most interesting chapter but really necessary for the story arc. There is a bit of cute fluff at the beginning, though!

——————————

You awoke with the weight of Bucky’s metal arm across your stomach, warm from being pressed against your stomach where your shirt had ridden up. His deep, even breaths tickled the back of your neck and caused you to smile. He’d slept soundly all night.

With a groan and a sigh, Bucky pulled you in closer and snuggled his face into the crook of your shoulder. You tried to wiggle out of his arms to get up but he held you tighter.

“Mmmmm,” he mumbled, “don’t go.”

“Well, good morning, sleepyhead,” you whispered. “I need to go to the bathroom.”

Bucky let out a disgruntled huff but released you. You came back over to the bed when you were done.

“Here.” Bucky patted the bed next to him and gave you his best puppy dog eyes. “Snuggle with me?”

Warnings: Not the most interesting chapter but really necessary for the story arc. There is a bit of cute fluff at the beginning, though!

——————————

You awoke with the weight of Bucky’s metal arm across your stomach, warm from being pressed against your stomach where your shirt had ridden up. His deep, even breaths tickled the back of your neck and caused you to smile. He’d slept soundly all night.

With a groan and a sigh, Bucky pulled you in closer and snuggled his face into the crook of your shoulder. You tried to wiggle out of his arms to get up but he held you tighter.

“Mmmmm,” he mumbled, “don’t go.”

“Well, good morning, sleepyhead,” you whispered. “I need to go to the bathroom.”

Bucky let out a disgruntled huff but released you. You came back over to the bed when you were done.

“Here.” Bucky patted the bed next to him and gave you his best puppy dog eyes. “Snuggle with me?”

[[MORE]]

“I’d love to, but I have to get ready for work.”

His face screwed up. “You have work today?”

You couldn’t help but laugh at his confused expression. “Yes, Bucky, I have work today. We met on Saturday and yesterday was Sunday. Today is Monday and I have to work.”

It was as though Bucky had made it his goal to make it impossible for you to get ready. He got up and practically hung from your shoulders as you selected your outfit for the day, only letting go when you shooed him out of the bathroom for your shower. Fortunately by the time you were out, Bucky was no longer in your room. You quickly finished getting ready for the day and headed toward the kitchen to see what you could grab for breakfast.

The smell of sausage and eggs assailed your senses as you approached, and to your surprise you found Bucky in the kitchen, wearing a green apron and standing over the stove.

“Perfect timing,” he grinned as you entered. “The toast should be up any minute and I just finished the sausage and eggs.” The sound of the toast popping up punctuated his sentence.

You moved to the toaster and pulled the four pieces of bread out. “What would you like on yours?”

“Strawberry jam, please,” he replied distractedly as he plated the eggs and sausage.

You went ahead and put jam on all four pieces and brought them to where he was setting the plates on the table. His face lit up when he saw them.

“Yes!” He saw your curious look and explained, “Steve’s the only other one around here who uses enough jam.”

Laughing, you replied, “Well, you’ve got to have enough to taste it.”

“Exactly!”

The breakfast conversation topics ranged around your favorite foods as the two of you got to know each other. You learned that Bucky would try anything at least once because he was so fascinated by the different cuisines from all over the world that could now be found in New York. He was telling you about his favorite Indian restaurant when you realized you had to leave immediately if you were going to make it to work on time.

Without thinking about it, you gave Bucky a quick peck on the cheek as you rushed out. He sat in his chair for several minutes with a big grin on his face before finally getting up to do the dishes.

———-

“Okay, Y/N, spill everything.” Margie practically assaulted you as you entered through the back door. “Jon’s been begging me to call you all weekend, and if I go home with nothing he just might kill me.”

You laughed at your coworker’s expression. “What do you want to know?”

“What’s he like? Is he different with you than with other people? Does the metal arm freak you out at all? Are you going to talk him into getting a haircut?” She sighed. “Also, Jon wants to know if the sex is amazing, but you don’t have to tell me. Please don’t tell me, actually. Tell me to tell him to forget about ever finding out.”

“We haven’t had sex yet,” you admitted. “He’s really sweet and wants to fall in love with who I am before we go that far, rather than take that step just because we’re soulmates. He’s quieter around most other people, but he doesn’t change his personality for anyone. The metal arm does not freak me out and,” you dropped to a conspiratorial whisper, “I may be getting my own soon, but he doesn’t know that yet.”

Margie’s screech brought Andrew out of his office with his phone in hand.

“Who’s hurt? Do I need to call 911?”

“Y/N is getting a metal arm!”

Andrew sighed and tucked his phone back in his pocket. “As epically cool as that is, could we save the horror film sound effects for actual emergencies, please?”

“Might be getting a metal arm,” you corrected Margie. “Tony and Bruce think it will work since Bucky has one, but since I’ve never had a left arm, we’re not positive my brain will know what to do with it. We won’t know until we try it.”

“I’m guessing you need leave for recovery when you have it attached?” Andrew asked.

Your eyes grew wide. “I didn’t think about that. I’ll ask Tony tonight what he recommends.”

“Go ahead and call him,” Andrew suggested. “The sooner we can plan the schedule, the better. Worst case, I have to help Margie for a couple hours a day until Karen gets here at noon.”

“I’ll do that,” you nodded, pulling out your phone and turning to Margie. “And I’ll sanitize the computer keyboards when I’m done. Can you go ahead and get today’s paperwork started?”

“It’s what I do best,” she replied with a grin. “Go call Iron Man, with whom you’re now on a first-name basis. Jon is gonna be so jealous.”

You laughed and placed your call as she headed out front.

———-

Tony had squealed like a little girl when he heard your voice. Your leave happened much earlier than you were expecting, but your boss had been fully supportive. Happy arrived within the hour to smuggle you back to the tower without Bucky finding out. You wouldn’t be back to work until the next week.

Shuri had already fabricated your new arm and sent it via courier along with the equipment used to install Bucky’s current arm. It was even more beautiful than you had imagined it would be. Looking at it, you felt a burst of excitement bubble up in your stomach. You were getting an arm just like Bucky’s!

Bruce talked to you through the prep for your procedure, telling you what to expect and how long it would likely take.

“We’re not sure how the anesthetic will work since you’re affected by the same serum as Bucky,” he told you, “but since we want to surprise him with your arm and he’ll feel anything you feel during the procedure, we’re going to knock you both out. That combined anesthetic, without actually having the double dose in your system, should be enough. F.R.I.D.A.Y. will be monitoring just in case. You still want to do this?”

You nodded. “I really do. How are you going to knock Bucky out without telling him, though?”

“Oh, we’ve got our best people on it,” Tony laughed, coming in. “There’s no one better for the job.”

“You sent Clint, didn’t you?”

“I sent Clint.”

———-

Clint grinned to himself as he stalked his prey, crawling through the air ducts above the common room. Nat had placed herself exactly where he had asked her to, putting her conversation partner in just the right spot. He had been in position for just over a minute when she flashed him the signal. With a smirk, he lined up his shot and let his arrow fly.

“What the hell?”

Barnes mumbled and clawed at the tranquilizer dart before he hit the floor, Tony’s specialized super-strength knockout drug rapidly working its way through his system.

Natasha shot a thumb’s up at the vent Clint had fired through, and he kicked the cover open so he could drop himself down into the room.

“Mission complete,” she told him.

“I never miss,” he replied with a laugh. Barnes would be pissed when he woke up, but he’d leave that for Y/N to deal with. After all, it was technically her fault anyway.

Series: Part 2 of scarletvision stories for when you’re lying awake at two in the morning thinking about how infinity war Ruined Your Life and looking for fanfiction that’ll fix it
Summary:

A story about life, love, hope, and humanity.

Pietro is dead, Sokovia is scarred, and all seems lost as Novi Grad falls from the sky - and as Ultron’s terror ends, new challenges begin for the Avengers’ two newest members. Wanda begins her time with the team as an isolated and grieving sister, while Vision discovers that becoming an Avenger will be more difficult than expected. An intertwined origin story, along with shared loneliness and uncertainty about their new lives, will eventually bring the two heroes together into the duo we already know and love.

A compilation of post-Ultron, pre-Civil War stories intended to give Wanda Maximoff and Vision the character and relationship development they deserve.

A story about life, love, hope, and humanity.

Pietro is dead, Sokovia is scarred, and all seems lost as Novi Grad falls from the sky - and as Ultron’s terror ends, new challenges begin for the Avengers’ two newest members. Wanda begins her time with the team as an isolated and grieving sister, while Vision discovers that becoming an Avenger will be more difficult than expected. An intertwined origin story, along with shared loneliness and uncertainty about their new lives, will eventually bring the two heroes together into the duo we already know and love.

A compilation of post-Ultron, pre-Civil War stories intended to give Wanda Maximoff and Vision the character and relationship development they deserve.

Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
Relationships: Wanda Maximoff/Vision
Characters: Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), The Avengers (Marvel Movies) Fandom (Anthropomorphic)
Additional Tags: Angst, Hurt/Comfort, Suicide Attempt, Implied/Referenced Suicide, the first few chapters will be pietro’s death and wanda’s reaction to that, and we all know pretty well that she didn’t care to live or die as novi grad fell, so if reading her internal suicidal thoughts will hurt you please skip that bit, take care of yourselves okay kids, we also all know that vision will save her in the end, and her grief is a process but it’ll be okay I promise, I’ll add more tags as I update, Grief/Mourning, Implied/Referenced Character Death, Canonical Character Death, Past Character Death

summary: Its the last scene of infinity war. Thanos has been defeated and put into a space prison. A door opens, letting light flood into...
body:
Its the last scene of infinity war. Thanos has been defeated and put into a space prison. A door opens, letting light flood into his cell. Thanos looks up, defeated and heartbroken that he couldn’t fulfil his destiny. 

Suddenly speakers in the walls start blaring ‘Never Gonna Give You Up’. 

Loki walks in, with sunglasses. 

“How did you survive?” Thanos asks. 

“You can snap my neck but you’ll never snap my spirit” Loki turns and walks out, leaving Thanos in darkness once again.

The song continues blaring. On loop. For eternity. 
Thanos’ punishment is the ultimate rick roll.
